name: Upward Strike
description: A fast rising cut from low to high. Breaks guard positions and forces opponent to react quickly.

windUp.description: Attacker lowers weapon and body, preparing to strike upward

committed.description: Body rising, weapon cutting upward in fast arc

recovery.description: Resetting from high position, bringing weapon back to guard

variablePower.description: Can use 50% less (1 stamina) for weaker/slower attack, or 50% more (3 stamina) for explosive rising strike

telegraphs.description: Weapon drops to low position, point angling upward
Shoulders begin rotating upward, arms extending
Full commitment, body rising explosively with weapon

damage.notes: In prototype: 1 clean hit = death. Fast attack that's hard to defend against due to unusual angle.

specialProperties.description: Forces defender's weapon upward, creating opening for follow-up attacks
